Name: Angry Rock
About the game: Ever felt like tossing a rock at high speeds? Then you're in luck with Angry Rock ! Throw rocks by dragging your mouse away from the direction you intend to throw and they'll fly in the opposite direction compared to where you dragged. Achieve high scores as you beat the various levels included in Angry Rock . It's sure to be a rockin' good time! Features: Physics-Based Gameplay Inspired By Angry Birds Throw/Toss Rocks Anger Management Stress Alleviation
